blocks.title: Night walks + amphibians and insects
blocks.summary: Some of Ecuador’s most memorable wildlife appears after dark. Guides make it safe and rewarding.
blocks.notes: Start earlier if you want fewer crowds and the best light.

blocks.title: Rainforest lodge base + guided jungle walks
blocks.summary: Wake up inside the ecosystem — guided trails, river edges, and nighttime sounds you won’t forget.
blocks.notes: Pack a light rain layer and grippy shoes. Trails can be muddy. Plan for flexible timing and keep the next day light if travel is involved.

blocks.title: High-intensity rafting or extreme canyoning day
blocks.summary: If you want adrenaline on water — choose routes that match your skills and conditions.

blocks.title: Rafting day (class depends on river)
blocks.summary: A classic Ecuador adventure — rivers range from fun + splashy to serious, depending on the route.

blocks.title: Serious canyoning routes
blocks.summary: Bigger rappels, faster water, and higher intensity lines — best done with experienced guides.
blocks.notes: Most operators provide safety gear. Ask about pickup time and what to wear.

blocks.title: Cotopaxi summit climb
blocks.summary: A true mountaineering objective — altitude, glacier conditions, and a serious achievement.
blocks.notes: Bring layers and sun protection. Altitude can feel intense even on easy routes.

blocks.title: Cotopaxi day hike (refugio + viewpoints)
blocks.summary: One of the best “big day” adventures — high-altitude landscapes without committing to a summit climb.
blocks.notes: Bring layers and sun protection. Altitude can feel intense even on easy routes.

blocks.title: Cotopaxi landscapes + páramo trails
blocks.summary: Open highland terrain, volcanic scenery, and iconic Ecuador nature — perfect for active day hikes.
blocks.notes: Bring layers and sun protection. Altitude can feel intense even on easy routes. Pack a light rain layer and grippy shoes. Trails can be muddy.

blocks.title: Volcano viewpoints + big sky landscapes
blocks.summary: Classic Andean scenery where the scale is the experience — perfect for first-time Ecuador trips.
blocks.notes: Bring layers and sun protection. Altitude can feel intense even on easy routes.
